About
About
I'm a senior Mechanical Engineering undergraduate at BITS Pilani, deeply passionate about Supply Chain Management and Mechanical Design Engineering. Currently, I'm working at Flipkart, as a supply planning intern . As the CTO of the Inspired Karters Gravity team, I've honed my leadership and engineering skills while designing a human-powered rover for NASA's HERC event. Committed to personal growth and teamwork, I'm poised to excel in roles spanning Supply Chain, Mechanical Design, Product Management, or Business Analysis. As graduation approaches, I'm eager to transition into a full-time role, leveraging my unique skill set and dedication to drive success in these fields
…see more

Bhanu Pathak
Bhanu Pathak
   • 3rd+
Premium • 3rd+
CXO | Consumer-Tech & Marketplace Leader | xto10x | Tata Neu | Founding Team @ Udaan | Flipkart | P&G | J&J
CXO | Consumer-Tech & Marketplace Leader | xto10x | Tata Neu | Founding Team @ Udaan | Flipkart | P&G | J&J
1mo • Edited • 
 1 month ago • Edited • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
In recent months, we at xto10x have been speaking with founders and experts to develop a definitive point of view on GenAI applications in startups. Not to talk about the buzz, but to help companies move from curiosity to real deployment.

That means understanding how GenAI can drive measurable impact across functions: product, engineering, sales, customer support, marketing, and more. It also means understanding what’s hype and what’s real.

We have kickstarted several projects that may significantly increase the pace of Gen AI adoption in the ecosystem. We’re looking to partner with mission aligned individuals: experts who’ve helped companies deploy GenAI in live workflows or builders who have coached teams on the practical nuances of adopting Gen AI in the workplace.

If this sounds like you or someone you know, please DM me. We would love to learn from your experience and explore meaningful collaborations.

Pawan Raghuveer
Pawan Raghuveer
Pawan Raghuveer
   • 3rd+
Premium • 3rd+
Operations Excellence at xto10x
Operations Excellence at xto10x
1mo • 
 1 month ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Ever wondered how to unlock 5–7% CM1 in a D2C business through operations excellence?

That’s exactly what we set out to explore in our founders-only roundtables this April and May.

These sessions brought together sharp, curious, and candid founders. The magic? It wasn’t just about learning—it was about collective problem-solving seeded by‘s tested frameworks, real-life case studies, and rich founder experiences. Every question sparked insights. Every challenge turned into a shared opportunity for growth.

We deep-dived into logistics and warehouse costs and levers to control them, the true impact of delivery speed and accurate promise on profitability, the constant trade-off between cost efficiency and customer delight, and in the process we busted myths like “faster = costlier”

The outcome? Actionable takeaways, new ways of thinking, and a community of founders helping each other win.

Check out the highlights to see these powerful conversations in action.

Big thanks to all the founders who made these sessions truly special with their openness and insight.

Gagandeep M.
